1. This order may be cited as the Health (Amendment) Act 2021 

(Commencement) Order 2021.

title: 1, 2, 7, in so far as that section inserts sections 38F, 38H and 38I into the Act of
heading: 2. The 15th day of March 2021 is appointed as the day on which sections
text_raw:
2. The 15th day of March 2021 is appointed as the day on which sections 
1, 2, 7, in so far as that section inserts sections 38F, 38H and 38I into the Act of 
1947, and 9 of the Health (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 1 of 2021) shall come 
into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 March, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [113] 3

title: 1, 2, 7, in so far as that section inserts sections 38F, 38H and 38I into the Act of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints 15 March 2021 as the date on which those provisions of 
section 7 numbered sections 38F, 38H and 38I of the Health (Amendment) Act 
2021 come into operation. Those provisions concern the designation of 
facilities for quarantine (section 38F), service agreements for conveying and 
returning persons to designated facilities (section 38H) and service agreements 
for accommodation and maintenance for purposes of quarantine (section 38I).
